## The summary of the author of Building a new hOMe

The children's book, which follows Friz and their mission to construct a new home to hold all their family, is evidence of her ingenuity and willingness to impart important life lessons to young and old readers alike.The book inspires kids to overcome obstacles and ask for assistance when necessary by stressing the value of cooperation, friendship, and endurance. Readers may learn from Friz's story that they can accomplish their objectives and make their dreams flourish in to reality with the help of a optimistic outlook.
